doc.title: Outlook.com

application.doc: Outlook.com connector allows you to manage your mail, calendars, and contacts. You can perform various actions such as send mail, schedule meetings, add contacts, etc.

doc.title: Get calendar view of events Get calendar view of events.
Select a calendar.
Get emails This operation gets emails from a folder.
Mail folder to retrieve emails from (default: 'Inbox').
Retrieve only unread emails?.
If set to true, attachments content will also be retrieved along with the email.
Search query (like in the Outlook client) to filter emails.
Number of emails to retrieve (default: 10).
Number of emails to skip (default: 0).
Send an email This operation sends an email message.
Get emails (V2) This operation gets emails from a folder.
Mail folder to retrieve emails from (default: 'Inbox').
Recipient email addresses separated by semicolons (If any match, the trigger will run).
CC recipient email addresses separated by semicolons (If any match, the trigger will run).
To or CC recipient email addresses separated by semicolons (If any match, the trigger will run).
Sender email addresses separated by semicolons (If any match, the trigger will run).
Importance of the email (Any, High, Normal, Low).
If set to true, only emails with an attachment will be retrieved. Emails without any attachments will be skipped. If set to false, all emails will be retrieved.
String to look for in the subject line.
Retrieve only unread emails?.
Retrieve only flagged emails?.
Address of the shared mailbox.
If set to true, attachments content will also be retrieved along with the email.

Search query to filter emails. How to use '$search' parameter please refer to: https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/office/office-365-api/api/version-2.0/complex-types-for-mail-contacts-calendar#search-requests.
Number of emails to retrieve (default: 10).
Send an email (V2) This operation sends an email message.
Id of the email.
Get email This operation gets an email by id.
If set to true, attachments content will also be retrieved along with the email.
Internet Message Id.
Id of the email to delete.
Delete email This operation deletes an email by id.
Id of the email to be moved.
Move email This operation moves an email to the specified folder.
Mail folder to move the email to.
Id of the email to be flagged.
Flag email This operation flags an email.
Id of the email to be marked as read.
Mark as read This operation marks an email as having been read.
Id of the email to reply to.
Reply to email This operation replies to an email.
Reply comment.
Reply to all recipients.
Id of the email to reply to.
Reply to email (V2) This operation replies to an email.
Id of the email to reply to.
Reply to email (V3) This operation replies to an email.
Id of the email.
Id of the attachment to download.
Get attachment This operation gets an email attachment by id.

Send email with options This operation sends an email with multiple options and waits for the recipient to respond back with one of the options. Please refer to the following link regarding the support of actionable messages in different mail clients: https://docs.microsoft.com/outlook/actionable-messages/#outlook-version-requirements-for-actionable-messages.

Send approval email This operation sends an approval email and waits for a response from the recipient. Please refer to the following link regarding the support of actionable messages in different mail clients: https://docs.microsoft.com/outlook/actionable-messages/#outlook-version-requirements-for-actionable-messages.
Get calendars This operation lists available calendars.
Select a calendar
Get events (V1) This operation gets events from a calendar. (V1)
An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.
Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).
The number of entries to skip (default = 0).
Select a calendar
Create event (V1) This operation creates a new event in a calendar. (V1)
Select a calendar
Select an event
Get event (V1) This operation gets a specific event from a calendar. (V1)
Select a calendar
Select an event
Delete event This operation deletes an event in a calendar.
Select a calendar
Select an event
Update event (V1) This operation updates an event in a calendar. (V1)
Select a calendar
Get events (V3) This operation gets events from a calendar. (V3)
An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).
An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.
Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).
The number of entries to skip (default = 0).
Select a calendar
Create event (V3) This operation creates a new event in a calendar.

option.value: (UTC-04:00) Georgetown, La Paz, Manaus, San Juan
(UTC+01:00) Amsterdam, Berlin, Bern, Rome, Stockholm, Vienna
(UTC+02:00) Helsinki, Kyiv, Riga, Sofia, Tallinn, Vilnius

doc.title: Get calendar view of events (V2) This operation gets all events (including instances of recurrences) in a calendar. (V2)
Select a calendar
An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).
An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.
Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).
The number of entries to skip (default = 0).
Search text for matching event body and subject

doc.title: Get contact folders This operation lists available contacts folders.
Unique identifier of the contacts folder to retrieve
Get contacts This operation gets contacts from a contacts folder.
An ODATA filter query to restrict the entries returned (e.g. stringColumn eq 'string' OR numberColumn lt 123).
An ODATA orderBy query for specifying the order of entries.
Total number of entries to retrieve (default = all).
The number of entries to skip (default = 0).
Select a contacts folder
Create contact This operation creates a new contact in a contacts folder.
Select a contacts folder
Unique identifier of a contact to retrieve
Get contact This operation gets a specific contact from a contacts folder.
Select a contacts folder
Unique identifier of contact to delete
Delete contact This operation deletes a contact from a contacts folder.
Select a contacts folder
Unique identifier of contact to update
Update contact This operation updates a contact in a contacts folder.
Id of the event to respond to.
Response for the event invite
Respond to an event invite Respond to an event invite.
Id of the message to forward.
Forward an email Forward an email.
